PrecisDecision of the Governor in Council to UPHOLD a ruling (CRTC 2000-203) made by the Canadian Radio-television and Telecommunications Commission on June 16, 2000, concerning the issuance of a broadcasting licence to operate an English-language FM radio station in TORONTO (Milestone Radio Inc.).
